strapiPost.title: Gathering on the Green
strapiPost.content:
The NWA Championship is so much more than a golf tournament. It’s an opportunity for the community to be a part of a wide variety of family friendly events! 

  • What's happening: During the week there will be yoga events for kids and adults, LPGA Tour Professional Maria Fassi will hold a junior golf clinic, and a 5k @ the LPGA will take place to benefit Mercy. You can download the ‘NWAChampionship’ app for daily schedules and updates. 
  • For the food: There is also opportunity to have the BITE Experience with access to exclusive viewing locations on the course with local food and beverage samplings. Registration is open and tickets are available.

Learn more, and get involved HERE.
